name: event
description: Template designed for events. Use it for conferences, seminars, concerts... It features a unique and slick design and integrates well with your brand logo. Use it to give informations about the event: map, schedule, directory, about page and news. Populate the photo and video gallery with pictures from the event.

news.title: News
news.description: Latest news concerning the event (e.g. blog)

tweets.title: Comments
tweets.description: Comments on social networks (e.g. tweets from an hashtag)

calendar.title: Schedule
calendar.description: What is happening and when? A detail list of yoru schedule (date, place, title...)

speakers.title: Speakers
speakers.description: List of speakers, artists, sponsors or companies you want to feature

photos.title: Photos
photos.description: Pictures live posted from your event

videos.title: Videos
videos.description: Recording of the event. Suggestion: create an empty playlist that you will fill after the event.
